attributes.action: Invest in NHS supported Dental Practices
attributes.additional_details: This is a national crisis. Increased NHS funding to ALL dental practices must be provided to enable all lower income patients access to Dental Care.
attributes.background: Provide NHS practices with full funding so ALL eligible citizens can gain access to required Dental procedures under NHS funding.  Increase NHS Dental Practices throughout the UK.  Current access to Dental Practices is almost impossible for eligible patients and we have the right to NHS treatment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Fund free NHS dentist treatment for all UK Citizens
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/741025

Increase funding for NHS dentists and the NHS dentistry system
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/743481
